why are you guys so salty about a fanfic? that's hilarious lol

lol ichiruki shippers are so salty, just get over it, Ichihime is cannon and was the clear pair from the start, Kubo even asked people to stop shipping ichiruki as he sees them as having more of a sibling relationship

@KindDick and @PoSou.    And I'm of the opinion ichigo being the biggest baddest OP MF he was in that universe he should've gotten it on with every hot girl in that story.... if I'm gonna fantasize about fictional relationships I'm gonna go all out ok,  lol
@KindDick and in my eyes  Orihime is more like a big sister to him, so in the end it goes in circles. So it's more of a matter of opinion I guess

Let me guess this doujin is to appease salty Ichigo x Rukia shippers. Guys Ichigo and Rukia have more of a sibling relationship, plus Rukia is like over 150 years old and is dedicated to being a part of the Gotei 13, it would never work out. Also Renji x Rukia is a much BETTER pairing and actually makes sense.
I got so hard reading this. Curious to see what happens next
